entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:52 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 11:32 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
